hero.subtitle: with Soul and Authenticity
hero.description: BNomad bridges global innovation and local communities, creating meaningful ventures that honor both tradition and transformation.

about.title: About BNomad
about.heading: Glocal Innovation with Purpose
about.description: We are a venture studio based in Jeju, Korea, dedicated to fostering innovation that respects local culture while embracing global collaboration. Through programs like Spain Roadtrips, Lab Tours, and our Jeju Sehwa House, we create spaces where LEINNers and local innovators can co-create meaningful projects.
about.mission: Our mission is to build ventures with soul — projects that matter to communities and create lasting impact.

spainRoadtrip.title: Spain Roadtrip
spainRoadtrip.description: An immersive journey through the Basque Country's cooperative ecosystem, connecting with Mondragon University and local innovators.

labTour.title: Lab Tour
labTour.description: Hands-on exploration of innovation labs and maker spaces, fostering cross-cultural learning and collaboration.

jejuHouse.title: Jeju Sehwa House
jejuHouse.description: Our home base in Jeju — a collaborative space for programs, workshops, and community gatherings.

popupCollabs.title: Pop-up Collaborations
popupCollabs.description: Short-term intensive projects that bring together diverse talents to solve real community challenges.

join.title: Ready to Join the Journey?
join.description: Whether you're a student, entrepreneur, or partner organization, there's a place for you in the BNomad community.

partner.title: Partner with BNomad
partner.description: We collaborate with universities, communities, and organizations that share our vision for meaningful innovation.

footer.tagline: Glocal Innovation with Soul and Authenticity
